about_the_game:
Listen to the music of Paperbound whenever you want. This includes all the tracks from Paperbound plus additional ones not present in the game.

Track listing:

01. Discover
02. Origami Soul, Inception of Eddy
03. Welcome to the Skull Kingdom
04. Bibubble
05. Whirlygigs
06. Sorrowskull Mountain
07. Two Heaven, One School
08. Earth
09. Water
10. Fire
11. Wind
12. Void
13. The Extraordinary Voyages
14. Mushroom Sea
15. Cave of Wonders
16. Labyrinth
17. Book of Coming Forth By Day
18. Sun Glow
19. Temple of the Gods
20. Spirit Stones
21. Where the Straight Way Was Lost
22. Pages of Pain
23. Rib Crusher
24. That Eye
25. Grinder
26. Sunnier Days
27. Close the Book
28. Paperbound Main Theme

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or newer
  • Processor: x86 or newer
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Listen to the music of Paperbound whenever you want. This includes all the tracks from Paperbound plus additional ones not present in the game.
